name: The Flintstones
overview: Bedrock is cracking up! It's up to you to put it back together. Join TV star Fred Flintstone on his zany quest to help his friends and family. It won't be easy. Use your club to fend off crabasauruses and other silly sea creatures in a cool underwater level that will leave you holding your breath. Take off across the stone age desert for some tough driving in the trusty Flintmobile. Ride Pterodactyls to breathtaking heights and if you can take the heat, venture into the torturous switch banks of the volcano - whatever it takes to get the job done. The Flintstones come to life.
